    A

    A - Variable in class heparansulfate.LinEqCons
    Matrix in the linear system Ax = b.
    AVSFormCons - Class in heparansulfate
    Creates an affine constraint in standard form (Ax = b, with rank(A) < dim(b) and b >= 0)and with artificial variables (for phase I of the simplex).
    AVSFormCons(double[][], double[]) - Constructor for class heparansulfate.AVSFormCons
    Creates an affine constraint in standard canonical form (with added artificial variables) for phase I of the simplex: [I A] x = b, with b >= 0 and where I is the * m x m identity matrix representing the artificial variables.

    B

    b - Variable in class heparansulfate.LinEqCons
    Constant vector in the linear system Ax = b.
    backwardSubstitution(double[][], double[]) - Static method in class heparansulfate.MatrixOp
    Solves a linear system ax = b where the matrix a is upper triangular using backward substitution.
    BBSet - Class in heparansulfate
    Represents a set of chemical building blocks (e.g., disaccharides S and U), storing their unique labels and their relative abundances.
    BBSet(String) - Constructor for class heparansulfate.BBSet
    Constructs a set of building blocks from a data file.
    bounds(String, String) - Static method in class heparansulfate.GradientWidth
    Makes and saves S/U bounds at each position when all BKHS chains have same length.
    boundsAndN(String, String) - Static method in class heparansulfate.GradientWidth
    For supplementary material; bounds for different values of chain length n.

    completeSeq(int[], int) - Static method in class heparansulfate.MaxEntModelW
    Elongates an integer sequence to length lmax by padding the start with -1.
    CoordDescNNQP - Class in heparansulfate
    Solution to nonnegative quadratic programming: minimize (1/2)x^TQx + c^Tx subject to x >= 0 via coordinate descent.
    CoordDescNNQP(double[][], double[], double[]) - Constructor for class heparansulfate.CoordDescNNQP
    Solves: minimize (1/2)x^TQx + c^Tx subject to x >= 0.
    CSpec - Class in heparansulfate
    Cleavage specificities, based on a BBSet object (set of building blocks) and a file giving specificity for each building block name.
    CSpec(String, BBSet) - Constructor for class heparansulfate.CSpec
    Creates cleavage specificities, based on a BBSet object (set of building blocks) and a file giving specificity for each building block name.

    E

    equalitiesToInequalities(LinEqCons) - Static method in class heparansulfate.LinEqCons
    Transforms equality constraints Ax = b into a set of equivalent inequalities: Ax <= b and -Ax <= -b.

    F

    forwardElimination(double[][], double[]) - Static method in class heparansulfate.MatrixOp

    H

    HCModel - Class in heparansulfate
    Homogeneous Markov model of species (chain sequence) abundances (model H&C).

    Homogeneous Markov model of species (chain sequence) abundances (model H&C).

    HCModelSA - Class in heparansulfate
    Optimization of a homogeneous Markov model (model H&C) via simulated annealing to fit two heparinase digest constraint sets.

    heparansulfate - package heparansulfate

    HIModel - Class in heparansulfate
    Homogeneity and Independence (H&I) model: species abundances are defined by the overall disaccharide composition.
    HIModel(int, BBSet, CSpec, int) - Constructor for class heparansulfate.HIModel
    Computes heparinase fragment length distribution under H&I (this.g).
    HomogeneityFeasibility - Class in heparansulfate
    Feasibility problem solver (Phase I via Simplex) to test for the possibility of homogeneous disaccharide composition along BKHS chains when combined with heparinase digest constraints.
    HomogeneityFeasibility(int, int, String[], String) - Constructor for class heparansulfate.HomogeneityFeasibility
    Constructs a feasibility problem to test the compatibility of homogeneous disaccharide composition with heparinase digest constraints.

    I

    iter - Variable in class heparansulfate.CoordDescNNQP
    Keeps track of the number of iterations (1 iter == change of all components x_1, x_2, ..., x_n)

    LinEqCons - Class in heparansulfate
    Class that represents linear equality or inequality constraints: Ax = b or Ax <= b, where A is an m by n matrix and b is an m-dimensional vector.
    LinEqCons(double[][], double[], String[]) - Constructor for class heparansulfate.LinEqCons
    Constructs a linear equality constraint: Ax = b.
    LinEqCons(LinEqCons[]) - Constructor for class heparansulfate.LinEqCons
    Merges an array of linear constraints into a single LinEqCons object.
    LinEqCons(List) - Constructor for class heparansulfate.LinEqCons
    Merges a List of linear constraints into a single LinEqCons object.

    MaxEntModel - Class in heparansulfate
    Represents a Maximum Entropy (MaxEnt) model of BKHS (profiles of composition and correlation) for cases where all chains have the same length.

    Constructs a MaxEnt model for BKHS chains of uniform length.
    MaxEntModelW - Class in heparansulfate
    Maximum Entropy (MaxEnt) model of profiles of S/U composition and transition probabilities along BKHS chains when BKHS is represented with a mixture of chain lengths.
    MaxEntModelW(String, int, int, double, double, String) - Constructor for class heparansulfate.MaxEntModelW
    Constructs a MaxEnt model for BKHS chains with a mixture of chain lengths.

    POST-PUBLICATION CONVENIENCE CONSTRUCTOR.
    MaxEntOptim - Class in heparansulfate
    Geometric programming for solving a Maximum Entropy (MaxEnt) problem subject to linear equality constraints in the probability simplex.
    MaxEntOptim(double[][], double[]) - Constructor for class heparansulfate.MaxEntOptim
    Solves the MaxEnt problem subject to linear equality constraints using Newton's method.
    MixSpecies - Class in heparansulfate
    Enumeration of sequences (species) with a specified chain length distribution.

    N

    n - Variable in class heparansulfate.SimplexPhaseI
    Number of variables for Phase II.
    NIModel - Class in heparansulfate
    Represents a Nonhomogeneity and Independence (N&I) model: different building block composition at each position in a chain and independence between positions.
    NIModel(BBSet, CSpec, double[][], int) - Constructor for class heparansulfate.NIModel
    Represents a nonhomogeneity and independence (N&I) model.
    NIModelLIC - Class in heparansulfate
    Linear inequality constraints on a Nonhomogeneity and Independence (N&I) model.
    NIModelLIC(int, BBSet) - Constructor for class heparansulfate.NIModelLIC
    Linear inequality constraints on a N&I model: Ax <= b including nonnegativity, sum to 1 at each position, and overall disaccharide abundances.
    NIModelLIC(int, BBSet, double[][], int[]) - Constructor for class heparansulfate.NIModelLIC
    Linear inequality constraints on a N&I model: Ax <= b including nonnegativity, sum to 1 at each position, and overall disaccharide abundances.
    NIModelSA - Class in heparansulfate

    ProjOnPolyHSet(double[], double[][], double[], Random) - Constructor for class heparansulfate.ProjOnPolyHSet
    Projects vector y onto a polyhedral set defined by the linear inequalities Ax <= b.

    SFormCons - Class in heparansulfate
    This class represents a linear constraint Ax = b in standard form: matrix A (m x n) has rank m < n and b >= 0.
    SFormCons(double[][], double[]) - Constructor for class heparansulfate.SFormCons
    Creates a linear equality constraint in standard form (Ax = b with b >= 0) starting from a m x n matrix A (of rank m) and a vector b.

    Tableau - Class in heparansulfate
    Simplex tableau used for representing linear programming problems.
    Tableau(double[][]) - Constructor for class heparansulfate.Tableau
    Constructor for Phase II based on an array-tableau already in canonical form, with the exception of the last row (cost coefficients) which is reduced here.
    Tableau(AVSFormCons) - Constructor for class heparansulfate.Tableau

    Tableau(SimplexPhaseI, double[]) - Constructor for class heparansulfate.Tableau
